instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-00165 wil this boot  without battery?
threads.message:
hi all

820-00165 wil this boot  without battery?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-00165 wil this boot  without battery?
threads.message: Yes, even without a green light these turn on.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-00165 wil this boot  without battery?
threads.message:
oke, so when i put in a good battery no charger it boots into OS

when i remove battery, plug in charger it does not boot. (fan spins, green light goes orange, and i get a blinking battery symbol)

when i remove black flat io board cable and no battery it boots into OS

if i replace io board, io board cable with 100% working good on other logic board same result so io board and io board cable is not the issue.

i replaced connector on the logic board (the one for the black flat cable) no change

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-00165 wil this boot  without battery?
threads.message:
no battery no io cable  (821-1722-A )
PPBUS_G3H 8.57V
SMC_BC_ACOK 3.386

battery connected No io cable  (821-1722-A )
PPBUS_G3H 8.38v
SMC_BC_ACOK 3.392v

battery + cable connected
PPBUS_G3H 8.41v
SMC_BC_ACOK 3.390v

no battery but cable installed (821-1722-A )
PPBUS_G3H 8.59v
SMC_BC_ACOK 3.392v

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-00165 wil this boot  without battery?
threads.message: I really have no idea, it does look like an SMC issue.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-00165 wil this boot  without battery?
threads.message: yea was thinking the same, ill replace it tomorrow and report back

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-00165 wil this boot  without battery?
threads.message:
oke SMC had corrosion on 2 pins replaced and boots perfect.

SOLVED AND THANK YOU DUKE
